snippet.title: Arcade Game: Sun Dance (1979 Cinematronics)
snippet.description: A 3-D vector (wireframe) puzzlie-maze like shooting game where your role as the object in Sundance was to catch little suns that bounced back and forth between a pair of grids, which move closer and closer together as the game goes on.
